content: {"name": "Bromley Neighborhood Civic Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Serves only Hamilton residents\n- Need proof of your financial accounts.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1801 East State Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hamilton Township", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08609", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.2353002, "longitude": -74.7289284}, "phones": [{"number": "(609) 587-8100", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "03:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "03:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "03:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}]}
